name: Jane Doe
title: Software Engineer
summary: Experienced software engineer with a passion for developing innovative programs that expedite the efficiency and effectiveness of organizational success.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science

description: Designed and implemented a microservices architecture for the payments platform, improving reliability by 30%.
Built high-throughput APIs in Python and Go; introduced circuit-breaker and retry strategies for resiliency.
Owned CI/CD pipelines and reduced deployment time from 45 minutes to under 10 minutes.
Developed customer segmentation and churn prediction models (XGBoost, LightGBM) increasing retention by 12%.
Led A/B testing experiments end-to-end and created dashboards to communicate results with stakeholders.
Productionized ML models with Docker and scheduled retraining using Airflow.
Implemented event-driven services using Kafka that processed >100k events/minute.
Improved system observability by adding Prometheus metrics and Grafana dashboards.
Mentored junior engineers and conducted code reviews to improve code quality.
Built and optimized deep learning pipelines (PyTorch) for image classification with 92% accuracy.
Worked on data labeling workflows and feature engineering to improve model generalization.
Collaborated with product teams to design experiments and interpret model behavior.
Built ETL pipelines in Python to clean and aggregate web-scraped data for analysis.
Implemented prototype recommendation algorithms and presented findings to the team.
Automated data validation checks that reduced downstream errors by 18%.

projects.name: Realtime Recommendation Engine
description: Designed a low-latency recommendation service that serves personalized content in under 50ms.
Implemented mix of collaborative filtering and content-based features; A/B tests showed +8% CTR.

projects.name: Scalable Event-driven Microservices
description: Built a set of resilient microservices for order processing using Kafka and Docker Swarm.
Added backpressure handling and idempotency to ensure reliable processing at high load.

projects.name: Customer Churn Prediction
description: Created a churn prediction pipeline using feature stores and LightGBM; delivered 85% AUC.
Integrated model outputs with CRM to drive targeted retention campaigns.

projects.name: NLP Resume Parser
description: Built an NLP pipeline to extract entities (skills, experience, education) from resumes with spaCy and custom rules.
Deployed as a REST API and integrated with internal applicant tracking system.

projects.name: Experimentation & A/B Platform
description: Implemented an experimentation platform enabling consistent A/B tests across web and mobile products.
Provided statistical analysis tooling and automated reporting to product teams.
